news.title: 特朗普威胁阻挠美加大桥开通
news.title0: Trump threatens to block opening of US-Canada bridge
news.content: 特朗普威胁阻止连接美国与加拿大的新桥开通，要求美方获得“充分补偿”，此举引发对经济影响的担忧。
news.content0: President Donald Trump has threatened to block the opening of a bridge connecting the US and Canada until Washington is "fully compensated for everything" it has given to its northern neighbour.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 布里斯班公布23亿澳元奥运主场馆设计
news.title0: Plans for $2.3 billion stadium ignite debate in 2032 Olympics host city
news.content: 澳大利亚布里斯班公布2032年奥运会主场馆设计，耗资23亿澳元，灵感源自当地住宅风格，引发争议。
news.content0: Officials in Brisbane, Australia, have revealed plans for 2032’s Olympic stadium: a $2.3 billion venue inspired by the state’s typical suburban homes, known as “Queenslanders” — residential architecture that may be familiar to fans of Brisbane-based cartoon, “Bluey.”
news.author: CNN

news.title: 英国最小酒馆周日午餐预订秒光
news.title0: Gone in 660 seconds: Why this pint-sized pub is getting booked out in minutes
news.content: 英国布里斯托尔一家不起眼的小酒馆，因其周日烤肉午餐而闻名，预订在几分钟内就被抢购一空。
news.content0: Many have tried to stopIlona Maherfrom reaching her intended destination. A great number of them end up sprawled on the turf, watching on helplessly as the US rugby superstar runs in another try.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 巴黎兴起精品化古着商店
news.title0: The exacting vintage stores offering the cure to your fashion fatigue
news.content: 巴黎兴起一种精品化古着商店，空间宽敞、精心策展，旨在为厌倦快时尚的消费者提供治愈方案。
news.content0: Les Archives, located in Paris’ 6th arrondissement, is a secondhand designer store rendered entirely in millennial pink. This is not your typical Aladdin’s Cave vintage shop, where rails are stacked on top of each other and garments fill every corner. The blush-toned space is sparse, with a smattering of shoes on a couple of wall-mounted shelves, a few magazines, and a pink reproduction of a Mario Bellini Camaleonda sofa. Around 250 items, give or take, hang evenly on clothing rails that line each side of the shop. “I like to keep the store well-spaced,” said the owner and sole employee, 29-year old Nicolette Contursi. “I don’t want it to feel overwhelming.”
news.author: CNN

news.title: 美国东西部天气即将逆转
news.title0: The eastern US has been gripped by an Arctic freeze. That’s about to change
news.content: 美国东部严寒、西部温暖的极端天气格局持续数周后，即将发生转变，东部将再迎寒潮。
news.content0: The US is a nation divided, with frigid conditions, snow and ice entrenched east of the Rockies all the way into Florida, and record warmth and paltry snowfall in the West.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 2026年将塑造世界的11个建筑项目
news.title0: 11 architecture projects set to shape the world in 2026
news.content: 从纽约摩天大楼到非洲文化中心，盘点2026年即将完工并可能塑造世界面貌的11个重要建筑项目。
news.content0: For American architecture, 2025 may be remembered for the deaths of iconsFrank Gehry,Robert A. M. SternandRicardo Scofidio, a mastermind of New York’s High Line. More likely, however, it will go down as a year dominated by Donald Trump — hispreference for classicismand disdain for brutalism; his controversial demolition of the White House’s East Wing; hisclasheswith the designer of the ballroom replacing it; and his administration’s move toexclude architecturefrom its list of “professional” degrees.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 冬奥最古老项目面临衰退，或靠女性参赛拯救
news.title0: One of the Winter Olympics’ oldest sports is facing steady decline. Its savior could be finally allowing women to compete
news.content: 冬奥会最古老项目北欧两项面临参与度下降，其拯救之道可能在于首次允许女性运动员参赛。
news.content0: A little more than a week before the2026 Winter Olympicswere set to begin, Annika and Niklas Malacinski dialed into a Zoom call from their World Cup event in Austria. The sibling tandem from Steamboat Springs, Colorado, are among the best in the US in Nordic combined, which combines perhaps the most disparate sports possible: cross-country skiing and ski jumping.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 乌克兰民众在严寒中帐篷裹床求生
news.title0: Russia Knocked Out the Heat. So She Slept in a Tent on Her Bed.
news.content: 俄罗斯持续袭击乌克兰能源设施，首都基辅民众在严寒中被迫在床铺上搭帐篷保暖，生活陷入困境。
news.content0: Svitlana Zinovieva wiped icy condensation from her living room window and pointed to a smokestack rising from a central boiler heating her apartment block. There, in the distance, she had seen a Russian missile streak in and explode a few days before.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 意大利军警争抢奥运明星运动员
news.title0: The Games Before the Games: How Italy’s Security Forces Compete for Olympic Stars
news.content: 意大利空军和警察部队为提升形象和士气，竞相招募和资助顶尖运动员，形成一场特殊的“赛前竞赛”。
news.content0: The Italian curler Amos Mosaner returned home from the Beijing Winter Games in 2022 as a gold medal winner and the pride of the Italian Air Force, which had recruited him as a soldier-athlete and subsidized his training for years.
news.author: NYTimes
